first_para: Sir John Paul Stanley PC (born 12 January 1942) is a British Conservative Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Tonbridge and Malling from 1974 to 2015.

full.extract: Sir John Paul Stanley PC (born 12 January 1942) is a British Conservative Party politician who was the Member of Parliament (MP) for Tonbridge and Malling from 1974 to 2015.
full.title: John Stanley (MP for Tonbridge and Malling)
